report.title: Break-Up on The Akashic Plane
report.author: Lytesbre
report.bodytext: Dose - 15 mg ACO-DMT ('K') /n 20 mg ACO-DMT ('V') /n /n 850 pm - drank powder dissolved in water /n 910 pm - felt a heavy vibration, palms sweating /n /n We sat on a couch , holding hands, that's when we noticed our palms were /n sweating. Indian raga music playing on stereo.DMT like visions with /n closed and open eyes. /n /n K--I entered into a golden realm with a bright deity present, who said /n very clearly 'Not with him' which snapped me back to the awareness of /n sitting on the couch. I asked V 'What does that mean?' And V, /n flabbergasted, twisting and turning,said 'What do YOU think it means?' /n My response was indignant and I wanted to go after the entity that had /n said this to me! /n /n V-I was deep into the music and felt like I was entering a sacred realm. /n Suddenly I got to a point where I was being told where this realm and /n music is only for those entering with a single heart and pure love. I /n could go no further till I had expressed my pure heart. I took K by the /n hand and said let's go lie down on the bed. We cuddled and preceded with /n our trip. /n /n K-Upon cuddling, I entered into a beautiful moving colorful oneness with /n V. I sensed V taking my hand, approaching a golden being, where he had a /n conversation with it, requesting us to enter together into the entryway /n beyond the being.V pulled me into the entryway, where we became as one /n and back into the beauty of the oneness with V again. I was loving this /n so much and I said to V, this is so beautiful, where are you taking me? /n and V responded , 'That's what we're going to talk about..' /n /n V-I confessed/explained that my heart was not int the same place as K's /n and that I had to be 110 % honest before we continued this journey /n together. K told me to chill out and relax and we continued to embrace. /n /n K- I went back into a huge golden space that the entity had permitted us /n to enter, it was beautiful but I as I went further into the entryway, I /n came upon the essence of some kind of accident/ train wreck/distortion, /n preventing me from going any further. Very clearly, I was now told to /n listen and be quiet. I was not permitted to speak..However, I was /n blurting out things I was not suppose to say, and constantly reminded to /n be quiet at least four times.I.I perceived V to my left as a golden /n being on a throne,and to my right was the entryway with the being /n inside, I was dressed all in blue, veiled, with bangles all over my /n dress. I was in a realm of intense blues and golds.I laughed at V, and /n said 'You will not be my God!' V, angered said 'You will laugh when I /n tell you to laugh' I responded with silence. /n /n V- I remembered saying to K, I like to hear her laugh, it is interesting /n that she heard it a completely different way. /n /n K- in my anger, I now possessed a staff in my right hand and I went into /n the chamber where the entity was and proceeded to tell it that it was a /n false god and that Jesus was the real God and that he had created /n everything, including them. I raised my staff and struck the being and /n it vaporized. I did this repeatedly with many entities, I was angry and /n like a warrior princess archetype. I was now thrown back on the bed, /n noticing how I would go in and out in waves. V and I were astonished at /n how beautiful we both looked to each other and commented on it. and we /n cuddled and kissed...even with all the ongoing craziness of it we still /n had a love for each other. /n /n V-We had some intense conversations on our relationship and due to my /n personality and her religious beliefs that there were some /n irreconcilable differences. K pointed out some very astute observations /n on what my problems dealing with woman were. Boy, did she nail me! These /n were some valuable insights. I realized and said that I was like a wolf /n stalking his own heart .We also discussed our very different spiritual /n beliefs. This took place over a span of several hours as we would /n alternate intense conversations as the effects of the drug ebbed and /n flowed in waves. /n /n K- I would drift back to the beauty constantly, but I could only go so /n far until I encountered the vision of a trainwreck. This happened four /n times, I didn't want to face it and on the fourth time I realized that /n the trainwreck was V's relationship with me..and I was now trying to fix /n it. /n /n At 5:30 am the most intense parts had passed, sleep was difficult,so we /n both took Xanax.We were both shocked at waking up at 5:30 pm on the /n next day ! /n /n V- Basically this was an incredibly potent substance, but like MDMA I /n believe that this has strong empathogenic and therapeutic properties. We /n both joked that we had saved thousands of dollars in therapy bills! /n /n K- With the right person, the person you love, this could be the best /n experience of oneness one could ever have in this lifetime.
